website_summaries.verdict: Hair-thickening, B-complex formula shampoo with rosemary, aloe vera, saw palmetto, and coconut.
pros: Hair-thickening B-complex formula shampoo prevents hair loss
Treats thinning hair with rosemary, aloe vera, saw palmetto, and coconut
Removes DHT and supplies essential vitamins for hair growth
100% money-back guarantee if not completely satisfied
cons: Some experienced even more hair loss after using this product

customer_reviews.title: Read directions!
customer_reviews.text: When I simply wash my hair once, it doesn't foam up really. I thought it was crap. But then read the directions, (which says to wash once, rinse, then wash again and leave in for 3-4 minutes) and wow what a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Farmboy

customer_reviews.title: She feels like the chemo pills are thinning her hair and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo for my mother who was diagnosed with Lymphoma in March. She feels like the chemo pills are thinning her hair and was very upset about it, so I researched on Amazon and sent her a bottle. She is on bottle 2 and loves it. She said her hair is thickening and she loves how her hair feels. It makes me happy to see that she has more confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: My hair loss began to slow down within the first few weeks and has pretty much gone back to normal
customer_reviews.text: I started losing hair about a year and a half ago. I didn't do anything about it as my hair stylist said this happens from time to time. When it didn't slow down, I began to research products. When I came across this shampoo, the one thing that differentiated it from other products was a money back guarantee. That sold me and I am now on my second bottle. My hair loss began to slow down within the first few weeks and has pretty much gone back to normal. Thank you for this product. I'm on my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Hambrick

customer_reviews.title: This one is my fav.  They have diff ones that do diff. things
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these products!! I actually have new hair growth after using it for a couple months. It's very thick shampoo, so stay at your roots and remember a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Diane McCallister

customer_reviews.title: I am so amazed with this product and will definitely continue to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I have long hair down to my waist so over the years needless to say I have been losing my hair and the thickness!! This shampoo brought back the thickness immediately! I am not kidding!!! I am so amazed with this product and will definitely continue to purchase from this seller! My hair actually has body and not limp and thin like before!! Amazing!!! Thank you whoever created this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable re-growth in one month
customer_reviews.text: I switched swimming pools for my workouts, swimming capless, and ended up with severe chlorine damage to my hair. It was so bad, I looked like a chemotherapy patient. After a lotta tears and frustration, I turned to amazon user reviews and decided to give Biotin Shampoo a try. After one month, the difference is very noticeable, and I do believe it's helping re-grow my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Glory2God!

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair feel coarse and unmanageable
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this shampoo, but I absolutely hate it. I don't know if I'm doing something wrong or not, but my hair feels like straw after using this, and that is even with using conditioner. It is so unmanageable that I had to stop using it. I guess I'm stuck with it because I am too lazy to return things.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, wispy hair and have been looking for a shampoo that will give me some thickness without making my hair goopy. So far I'm quite pleased this this product. My hair feels fuller, and it looks thicker too. The shampoo has a pleasant smell, lathers nicely and delivers a nice experience. I'm a very new user, but I like the shampoo well enough already that I will likely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Further Dried Out My Dyed Blonde Hair
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product. They even sent me a coupon for a free bottle. I used the shampoo and conditioner, they both made my hair even dried than it looked before I was using it. It was very dull, and I was so afraid that I had ruined it even more! I threw all three bottles out. I didn’t even give them to anyone, what a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: PattyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful after doing plenty of research on different shampoos and thinking that I had finally found the one. However, it did nothing. I used it for two months and not only did it not help with hair regrowth, but it also thinned my hair even more. It looked as if I was walking with a bald spot on my head. Im not sure if it was there before, but it was more noticeable after I started using this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: SCARY!!!!!!!!!!!!’
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got a fake product, but it’s SCARY how much hair I’ve LOST using it. Every time I rinse off the shampoo, large amounts of hair are falling into my hands as I rinse off. I’m left standing there in the shower crying!!!! What on earth!!! I’ve stopped using it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Sharman

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! FORMULA VARIES FROM BOTTLE TO BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: I am confused when reading the other reviews who said the product was super thick or would get stuck in the bottle... THE SHAMPOO I RECEIVED HAS THE CONSISTENCY OF WATER. This made it impossible for me to even get the shampoo onto my hair because it fell through my fingers! This can only mean the brand is producing extremely different formulas— some people are getting a nice, thick shampoo and some people are getting pure water. DO NOT, I REPEAT, DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: kap

customer_reviews.title: All natural with Biotin
customer_reviews.text: This a great shampoo with all Natural ingredients besides the infused Biotin. It definitely gave my hair all sorts of body and shine. After shampooing I used a top rated conditioner that had a few uses in them and it still worked great! Biotin is a vitamin/mineral every mammal thrives on...your hair, nails, skin, etc. Just a suggestion but I have thin, fine hair that is going through a shedding phase at the moment. This product has some excellent moisturizing ingredients incorporated into it but just not quite the amount I needed so after towel drying I rubbed, a nickel size of my top of the line moisturizing styling cream--it worked wonderfully! This is a top of the line shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Darusha

customer_reviews.title: Good volumizer - doesn't regrow hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about the scent, though it's not offensive (a bit chemical-y) and it doesn't cling to my hair. My hair is soft and full after using it. It makes claims to regrow thinning hair, and that's not true for me. At. All. So I recommend that you retire that fantasy. I have very oily hair and scalp, and this helps control that. If you're not oily, you might want to follow the bottle's directions and always use a conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: W. Handy

customer_reviews.title: Dryed my hair out so bad had to get it cut and lost even more ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week . Dryed my hair out so bad had to get it cut and lost even more hair . Thanks alot ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not going to help grow hair but a very good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Used this product due to high reviews and hoped it would help with my thinning hair. I had a hair transplant and hoped this would help the parts where the native hair needs some growth. It smells good and lathers nicely, leaving my hair feeling fresh and clean. That’s where it ends. I expected growth but didn’t see any new hair (not even fuzzy ones) so wasn’t thrilled with that. It’s expensive as well compared to other shampoos. No hair growth after a year so did not purchase a new one. It smells good though.
customer_reviews.author: Mikael

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair so greasy!!!! (Writing from my father-in-law’s account) I’m a 22 year old girl and I thought this product is going to be amazing because I’m suffering from bad hairloss. This shampoo made my hair super greasy and was more difficult to brush it since it was all tangled up like never before. I don’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: The shampoo was not as good as the reviews had described it :(
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful and I did not see any results after carefully using this product since January.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Doll

customer_reviews.title: Dry, Brittle Hair
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this shampoo, it seemed to make my hair feel much thicker, but after using it a few times, all it seemed to do was make my hair extremely dry, even with conditioner. I had to stop using it because my hair was so unhealthy. Now that I'm back to my previous shampoo and conditioner, my hair feels much softer, healthier, and is so much easier to style. This biotin shampoo isn't right for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Sola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any & all hair types
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shampoo, it's great for anyone especially for those with thinner hair as it helps thicken thinner hair. It leaves my hair so healthy and soft. This shampoo is all natural so it doesn't have a perfumy smell but it also doesn't smell bad. I've been using this shampoo (and products from this brand) for over 2 years now and its helped my hair grow so much faster and healthier then it used to plus it's great for my dyed hair as its sulfate and pardon free
customer_reviews.author: SassyWvGal

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money for a leaking bottle....
customer_reviews.text: I would not repurchase this product, number 1 the cost for this size bottle. Number 2 I was very disappointed that my bottle was leaking upon arrival. It is inside a plastic bag, not sealed.....Would like to have given a better rating, hard to do so when you only can use part of the bottle. Please replace.... I know that will not happen....
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM S.

customer_reviews.title: Lost more hair
customer_reviews.text: Definitely lost hair after using. Terrifying seeing clumps of hair come out immediately with the first use.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Left greasy feeling
customer_reviews.text: So the first time I used this shampoo I loved it. The second time it left my hair feeling greasy and unfortunately it has every time I used it since. I made sure I was washing out all the shampoo because I thought maybe that was why my hair was so greasy but that wasn’t the case. This shampoo definitely did give me a fuller head of hair but I hate how my hair feels after it dries and how greasy it looks. I’ll finish out this bottle but won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had thick hair, up until a recent surgery and my hair began to fall out in clumps. I have used other shampoo's and didn't notice much of a difference. I found this item and so far have seen great results! My hair is coming back thicker and healthier. I love the way the shampoo smells and a little goes a long way. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tita

customer_reviews.title: I have hair again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a thyroid Patient, which means my once full head of hair was left to very little and very depressing. I tried several possible solutions and no help. I tried this product and it helped tremendously. I have my full head of hair again! Note: smell is a tiny bit medicinal but I’m also very sensitive to scent and you need to use conditioner which this product or else the volume is hard to control lol but I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and leaves hair feeling smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Got this shampoo (mainly) for my husband as he is the real one needing the “hair help” in the family. I can only really speak for the nice minty-ish scent, and the smooth feel of the hair afterwards, since my husband didn’t have any magic hair growth since he has been using this, but not sure any magic will come, but there is always hope. In the meantime, it’s always worth a shot. He leaves the shampoo in longer as the instructions suggest. He says his hair feels great after washing. I am just happy with that so far, and if I see hair growth out of this too, it’s really a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great - noticed a definite change!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shampoo that would help with my hair thinning and am so glad I found this! I was skeptical at first but now love this shampoo and intend to continue using it. I’ve been using it for a few weeks now and already see a difference in my hair thickness - everyone in my family has noticed too! It also smells great and leaves my hair feeling wonderful. My hair used to feel limp but looks alive and healthy now after using this shampoo for a while! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MomShopper

customer_reviews.title: Reduces the amount of hair loss!
customer_reviews.text: COVID and Stress really has taken a toll on my hair. This Boutin Shampoo has helped reduce the amount of hair loss. It thickens the hair shaft and the conditioner makes your hair feel super soft. I would highly recommend this Shampoo and Conditioner. In my next review... I will continue to update the progress on my thinning issues as I use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Someone who tries everything!

customer_reviews.title: The best "thickening" biotin shampoo so far
customer_reviews.text: Updated review 06 26 2018. This product is consistently very good. The clear shampoo is thick, so be sure your hair is thoroughly wet before applying. Some of the other "thickening" shampoos for fine, thin hair really dry out the scalp and make it itch. This shampoo does not do that. This is the fourth biotin shampoo I have tried, One of the best things about this product is that it is hypoallergenic and, thankfully, does not contain fragrance. I have reordered several times and just placed the shampoo on my subscribe and save order.
customer_reviews.author: ssddspas

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this product has made me lose a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product has made me lose a very large amount of hair from the onstart of using. I've been using for about a month and a half and I have about 30% less hair than I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren DeMuro

customer_reviews.title: The shampoo I always come back to
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Re:line Biotin Thickening Shampoo for a couple of years now. I was having issues with thinning hair and was looking for something that might help. I noticed when I started using it, that there was far less hair coming out when combing after washing. I've tried different shampoos from time to time, but this is the shampoo that I always come back to. I can't say that I noticed a real change in volume as my hair is extremely fine and straight, but hair loss was my main concern, and this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: GardenGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Have used the entire bottle and zero result, not only there isn’t any result from this shampoo but it also doesn’t leave your hair feeling nice on a day to day basis
customer_reviews.author: marina solodukho

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Made my hair shed!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. It made my hair shed a lot! I woke up and noticed a lot of hair on my bed. When I sat on my bed and leaned over, more hair fell out! I ran my hand through my head and clumps of hair fell out even more. This was the only new addition to my routine & it’s been a nightmare! Threw it in the trash immediately. Now I’m buying hair growth supplements instead and nothing that I’ll directly put on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It's defiantly helping...
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and hormone issues. My hair has been thinning for years and it used to be so think when I was a kid. This is defiantly bringing some on my volume back to my hair. I'm sure most of the thinning can't be fixed because of the hormone imbalance but this is helping me not look so thin in the hair. It doesn't really have a smell to it. Kind of like a "just fresh" smell.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Grew my hair back!
customer_reviews.text: At my age, my hair falls out when I get too stressed and 2020 has been nothing but stress! I have been using this product for 2 months and I have baby hairs growing back everywhere. There is also a ton less hair in the drain. it is a thicker shampoo, so I shampoo with a regular shampoo first and then use this one second. It makes it so this one really foams up and gets more time on my scalp. I have tried a lot of shampoos in the past for this problem. This is the only one that has worked and left my hair feeling amazing. I do not know what I would do without this product!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Boy, I had mediocre expectations for trying out this shampoo, but I am surprised. When the bottle said "you only need a little" I thought, yah, right. Every natural shampoo or more healthy shampoo always needs to be doused on to even get something close to resembling a lather. Not so with this one! You really only need a little bit and my hair feels healthier! I received a sample to get my feedback and I am so glad I got the opportunity. Can't wait to see what the effects are in a month or so!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steffi Lee

customer_reviews.title: Average clean. No hair growth.
customer_reviews.text: Like many hair growth "promoting" shampoos, this one fell short too. After several months, no hair growth improvement was seen. My hair was nice and clean, but that's what you get out of any high quality shampoo without paying high prices all the time. So this one is just average. The search for a real growth promoting shampoo continues...
customer_reviews.author: DCdevil

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a week and am very pleased with this shampoo and conditioner. Very pleasant scent and my hair is softer, shinier and more manageable than before. I don't expect it to regrow hair that I've already lost, I'm a 65 yo male with typically moderate male pattern baldness, but I think I see less loose hair on towel after towel drying. At first I thought the 16 oz bottles would be used up very quickly, but when applied as directed, very little product is actually required. I have soft water which helps I'm sure. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: JC in MN

customer_reviews.title: Great volume!
customer_reviews.text: I use this paired with head and shoulders, minoxidil, and finastride. Over 6 months my hair is much thicker, my hairline has moved further out, and volume looks great. I love the scent and how foamy this shampoo gets. In my experience natural shampoos don't foam well but a little goes a long way with this. I will rinse with head and shoulders first rather than do two rinses of this. Seems to work great with me. After a blow dry my hair is very poofy and thick. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product foe the past 2 weeks. My hair is destroyed. It is dry and coarse. I am so sad about this. I even added a few drops of Jojoba oil but my hair texture is just horrible now. FYI, I dont color my hair. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo but not really for regrowth
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks in and I haven't see any result, this could be on of the scam shampoo out there. If I getting more hairs I will update this. But so far it can only said this is good hairs shampoo. However, it's not for hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: 👏🏽 Great job 👏🏽
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shampoo! . It is amazing. I have thin hair and I haven’t really been one to invest in shampoo conditioner before so I thought I would try taking care of my hair better especially with all the hair dye. The first time I used it I thought it was fluke because my hair was so soft. Second third fourth same result every time. I have never felt my hair so soft and flowing. My hair definitely seems fuller after using this shampoo. Doesn’t look greasy because my thin hair definitely gets greasy quick but none of that. But highly highly love and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denia Avila

customer_reviews.title: do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the good review. it was WRONG! do NOT recommend this product. When I used this product for the first time, a lot of hair fall out. I was shocked and will never use it again. Unfortunately, I did not open it within 30 days of purchase so it's too late to return, wasted money... I wish people are honest about their reviews. Disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Sucky expensive shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2weeks hoping for nice thick, strong, and shiny hair...To no avail, this product left my hair looking dull, dry, heavy and flat. I had to go back to my other shampoo to restore my hair texture. I am very disappointed that this product didn't deliver...I feel like I have been ripped off..
customer_reviews.author: Novice of None

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month now and I've only used it three times because of the texture of my hair (4c) I don't use shampoo often because it strips my hair and instead I use conditioner regularly. I can't really say that I've noticed a difference because of how sparsely I've been using it, but I do like the lack of chemicals and my hair didn't feel as brittle after using it as I've experienced in the past with other shampoos. I'll keep using it and update on whether or not I notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Erlene S.

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, then Itch
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to help at first - my hair loss stopped for awhile - so I continued using it, then 9-10 months later in addition to the return of hair loss, it made my scalp itch, which is all very unpleasant, so I quit using it. Seems like a temporary solution for hair loss but the real deal breaker was the scalp itch. I won't buy it again even though it did show some promise at first.
customer_reviews.author: Best I Can

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair healthier
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo as it adds volume to my hair and I’m finding that it looks healthier and I’ve had less breakages so it’s stronger. Even though my hair is very long I don’t have to use too much to get it all lathered. Def works best with the accompanying conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best healing shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was mending from five broken bones and a coma. My hair was coming out in clumps from all the stress and pain. Started using the Biotin shampoo. Within two weeks I really noticed stronger, thicker and shinier hair. What a relief! It’s been a month now and my hair is looking and feeling so much better. Will definitely use this going forward. Very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lesh-Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Good, if you want thin and rubbery hair
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 5 months before giving up. The shampoo is not very good. It leaves behind a gunky residue that weighs down your hair so there’s no volume benefit. It made my hair very rubbery to touch, which led to my hair breaking and thinning more than anything else. The conditioner is very light and doesn’t actually condition. You could use the shampoo alone and wouldn’t see a difference. I tried pairing this with hair masks and volume treatment to see if there was some magic trick to make it work. Nothing did. This is just a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Harp

customer_reviews.title: My hair has finally stopped falling out in clumps!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product has helped with stopping my hair fall out and regrowth. I lost weight, had surgery and my dermatologist told me weight loss can cause hair loss. I started using this about 3 months ago, along with some oral products, like biotin, keratin, collagen, multi vitamin, D3 and zinc. It took about 3 months but my hair is not falling out like before and I’m getting new growth, this product certainly must be helping. I use it once a week and use a good conditioner, otherwise it dries my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: TriggDog

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for more
customer_reviews.text: it is an okay shampoo but I found that it left my hair rather drab, no volume, a bit frizzy. I used it religiously and left it on my hair/scalp for the four minutes as recommended - nothing. I gave it three stars because it might have strengthened my hair but unfortunately did little to add volume or shine.
customer_reviews.author: Friscochase

customer_reviews.title: Difference in just a few days
customer_reviews.text: Definitely see a difference with using this product. I’m a hairdresser and have fine hair, and feel as though I have less hair and less volume. just a few days of using it I see an increase in volume and shine. I’m hoping it will also promote hair growth, but so far, so good. Smells good unlike another brand that I’ve tried In the past.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: I'm breastfeeding and this is a miracle for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I'm breastfeeding for 8 months now and starting losing my hair. Believe me, it's not fun: I cut my hair to manage it, take postnatal vitamins, but nature is not on my side. I tried several products and this one is the best! Less hair falling, it's thicker, almost no scent. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: New Hair Growth!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this product very much! I’ve tried two others, one being well known and sold on tv but neither of those showed me the results that this one has. Granted it took it a while before I saw the results but it’s all worth it. The area around my temples and the top of my head were really thinning but I’ve noticed that they’re filling in with new hairs! I’m excited!
customer_reviews.author: RedSparrow

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any difference after using this shampoo for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a HUGE difference
customer_reviews.text: I have always experienced a lot of fall out. Whether it be brushing my hair or just running my fingers through it. My hair is quite think and long but I noticed more thinning at the front of my crown where my hair parts. I started using this shampoo and noticed a huge difference. It does not lather which took some getting used to but I would switch this out sometime with the OG Biotin brand as I have heard its good to switch up shampoos sometimes. I will be purchasing again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeKBC

customer_reviews.title: Can't Use It!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this shampoo and the conditioner and they are terrible for my hair. They leave my hair limp and flat and looking even thinner than it already is. The conditioner expecially does nothing for my hair to add any volume at all. I've seen cooked noodles have more body. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: ScaperGal

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to it's hair loss/thickening/volumizing abilities but I do love this shampoo. The smell is mild. It's a bit medicinal and floral but not enough that it bothers me and the smell doesn't linger. The shampoo leaves my hair feeling clean and flexible without being too squeaky clean feeling. It's very easy to use. The viscosity is quite thick and has great foaming action so a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Hungry Goose

customer_reviews.title: Caused an allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this shampoo because it did seem to make my hair more soft in the 1-2 weeks I used it, however I ended up with a red rash with tiny blisters on my ears, neck and fingers from it. I purposely bought this shampoo because it didn't have tea tree oil which I know makes my scalp itchy, but there is some other ingredient in this that has caused the worse contact dermatitis I have ever had. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: severe eczema and thin hair
customer_reviews.text: i just received my bottle within one day. I am so hopeful it will work because my daugter had severe eczema on her scalp as a baby and for first two years of life. She finally grew hair at age 2 but she is now 6 and still not having her hair fill in much in the front. It grows longer but not in the front. I will update once I try this bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy

customer_reviews.title: My hair feels constantly hydrated!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for 3 weeks and I feel a huge difference! My hair feels stronger and thicker already. I always had long dry hair and lose a lot of hair everyday. After using that shampoo for a week or so, I noticed less hair falling when I shower, and my hair feels constantly hydrated. I love the fact that it's all natural ingredients and... it smells soooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Shmuel

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This product will get your hair clean, but can only be used about three days in a row, or you will spend all day scratching your head. I had to switch back to my regular shampoo, as it does not seem to be for every-day use. Didn't seem to thicken my hair up, but my hair did look good when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: robert1725

customer_reviews.title: Great product for clean hair
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and pleasant smell. Definitely notice less hair falling out in the shower drain, before using this shampoo I would regularly have to remove clumps of hair from the drain, but since I started using it has been minimal to no noticeable hairs in the drain. My scalp also feels much healthier than before as well.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: Provides Softness
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencing hair loss for 5 years, and needed help lol. This shampoo makes my hair so soft/manageable, and rinses away so easily ABSOLUTELY NO TANGLES! feels luxurious. At this point I don't believe any shampoo can help with "hair loss" but this makes my hairs look & feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I can obviously feel that it cleaned my hair thoroughly. My hair does not get oily anymore, which is awesome! I only used two times and I feel like it's already growing my hair? I know it sounds impossible but it does make my hair look more than before. Make sure you leave the shampoo on your head for 3-4 minutes. I only bought shampoo but not the conditioner because it's kind of expensive for me. Hopefully I will be able to buy the conditioner later....great product anyway, highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: hi and bye

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Slow My Thinning Hair
customer_reviews.text: I buy shampoo with biotin to keep as much of my hair as possible--I am 71 years old and holding. My hair always feels completely clean, with no residue or anything left on my hair after I shampoo. I intend to keep using this biotin shampoo from now on. I would highly recommend it for anyone trying to take extra good care of their hair.
customer_reviews.author: jh21

customer_reviews.title: Effective quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts before getting another product for hair loss, but this blew me away. The effect was pretty quick to show, after a couple of washes I was able to see thick hair, and thought I went back a few years when I had a full head of hair. It smells nice and makes your hair soft as well. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matteo Saradini

customer_reviews.title: Super!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my excessive hair loss. Satisfied so far. From all the products I have bought for this issue, by far the best. The shampoo doesn’t strip the hair of its moisture, I don’t use conditioner any longer, the shampoo is gentle enough. Hair and scalp feel clean and light. Just a hair oil/serum afterwards. Ok for colored hair. Definitely less time, work and money spent on my hair than before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've made my review two stars rather than one to account for the excellent customer service I received
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the shampoo long enough to notice hair growth, but I returned the product after noticing zero change in hair quality. It's a perfectly serviceable shampoo, but for the price tag I was expecting much more, hence my rating. I've made my review two stars rather than one to account for the excellent customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: USMC4341

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN NIOXIN
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was pretty amazed!!! I have been using Nioxin for over a year now and after using this for a month I can actually say I see and feel a difference!! I don't feel like the horror movie CARRIE while shampooing my hair anymore!! 🤣 it was pretty bad.. 😱 but thank you! Definitely going to buy another bottle when it gets low!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Stops hair loss
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo saved my hair from falling out. I have very fine hair shoulder length and was starting to loose some. It adds body also and has really made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: It smells really nice
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times so far and maybe its my imagination but it seems to be making my hair not fall out as much. Yipee!
customer_reviews.author: shadow11990

customer_reviews.title: Best product for hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I started using this shampoo and conditioner a month ago and I must say there is way less hair in my hairbrush. I absolutely love this shampoo and conditioner and I know it's makung my hair not fall out as much whuch equals reqrowth. I would love to do a YouTube video for this product because it's that's good. I may just do one for my channel. Thank you for selling this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Beaton

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away - cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product along with its 'conditioner' and applied as told in the instructions. However after 25 days of once daily use, my hair have become thin like a straw and easily break! Like they would break from middle. Horrible cheap product. Many such 'biotin' shampoos are sold with different names, pretty much all contain low quality ingredients. Save whatever hair you have left, and importantly save your expectations. Go buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: swq

customer_reviews.title: Made without harsh chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for a few weeks now and I really like it. This product is made in the USA and does not contain sulfate or parabens. The scent is great, neutral, and fresh. I haven't noticed any huge change in volume or thickness in my hair yet but I have very fine hair and I really haven't had any products that were able to change that. Overall, this is a good product and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Natural and revitalizing
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. The all-natural formula works wonders for my hair. My hair is usually frizzy after a wash and using this shampoo, it has a significant weight and smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My hair started shedding more after I use this.Did not help with my hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Surfing_San_Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this shampoo! Was looking for something that can add volume and make my hair grow a little faster. This one is great! I have a very thin hair with split ends, but I like to keep it long. So every time I trim it I hate to lose the length. With this shampoo I won't have to worry about going shorter :)
customer_reviews.author: Lana Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Not seeing a change
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is thick and lathers up nicely. I have to use a lot to get it all over my head though. I've used it for about 4 months and don't really see a change. My hair is still brittle due to heat and coloring. It really has no smell and that is fine. I don't find that it feels squeaky clean but it does feel clean. Overall I'd probably get another product.
customer_reviews.author: Superbean

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on hair
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell if effective. Have always had very fine hair, now thinning. No overwhelming scent, if use as directed does get hair very clean. I never use a conditioner, makes hair too flat. Easy comb out, non drying. Time will tell how effective.
customer_reviews.author: Renee K.

customer_reviews.title: A success
customer_reviews.text: After major surgery in October of 2018 my hair was falling out by the handful & my comb was full of it as well. I was told this was normal after what I went through, however, being 74 I didnt want to go bald either from something non cancerous. I got on Google & researched the problem. It said something with Biotin in it. So, I took a chance & ordered this. It has helped tremendously & to my surprise I never have hair even in my comb & my hair has come back curly, which I never had in my life. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Fleischhacker

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time using it, definitely added volume to my hair. Volume is visible on both sides of my part. They are bouncy instead of flat like they were before. My natural waves are more visable and bouncy. As for hair thinning, I'll have to use it a little bit longer to see if it helps. If it stings any part of your head, that means you didn't rinse it out well enough. Only reason I'm continuing use is because it made my hair bouncy and full of life. I am using OGX argan oil conditioner as well. I will update my review if I notice a difference in hair loss or not. Smells like rosemary oil
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA M.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Shampoo; Does Help My Thinning Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love that the shampoo is not overly scented. It's a treatment, so leave it on your hair for a few minutes. For me, it seems to have halted my hair loss (I also take biotin and inositol), and my thin hair looks better as well.
customer_reviews.author: book lady

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal! My hair had grown so thin and unhealthy. I was losing handfuls a day. In desperation I came to amazon to look for a shampoo that would help. I bought this one. In one or two weeks I was losing less hair. Fast forward to 4 months later and I have lots of new growth that is 5 inches long and normal shedding. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing I have used other biotin products and gotten some good results but none with shampoo and conditioner It lacks the smell typical of these shampoos so was more pleasant to use. No better than normal shampoo
customer_reviews.author: genieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once and let me tell you a little goes a long way so definitely worth it for the price. I have short hair so this will last me a while. I use it along with my dandruff control shampoo. I saw some reviews that mentioned the scent was ok but I think it smelled nice. Even if it doesn't, nothing a nicely scented conditioner cant fix. Made my hair soft and nice, don't know how it's doing in the volume and hair growth part as I have only used it once so I will wait a bit and update you later.
customer_reviews.author: Patil H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the subtle smell and I also like using products ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for a week only now but I definitely see a difference. I see less hair in the bathtub after I'm done. I like the subtle smell and I also like using products that are healthy and good for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: ZS

customer_reviews.title: Incredible story of ovcoming tragedy and bringing back hope.
customer_reviews.text: When I started the book, I could not but it down. The story captivated my interest to the very end. Mr. DeAngelis showed how to face fear, learned to reach out for help through the pain and brought hope back into a community. By not letting something so heinous destroy himself, his students and school, he lead by example to take back what two others tried to eradicate.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product - After trying many others!
customer_reviews.text: Searching for a product that thickened hair without leaving a residue and that didn't have a fragrance, I tried over a dozen other products. Most didn't make any noticeable difference, had an undesirable smell or didn't rinse cleanly. Biotin Shampoo for Hair Growth is terrific. I just placed my 25th order for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ross

customer_reviews.title: Creates static
customer_reviews.text: I must confess that today was only my second use of this shampoo and its matching conditioner. However, both times I was left with a head full of static electricity. I did nothing different from my usual routine (currently Pantene....shampoo, condition, towel dry, no other products). I really won't use these two products again, so this has been an expensive lesson unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Winter

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell yet if the product does what it says as I've only used it twice now. It does leave my hair soft. However, the smell is terrible. Smells like your grandmother's hair dye - not a natural smell at all but it's supposed to be all natural. I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to make it through another week. Giving it 3 stars because it may or my not work - I'm not the judge - someone else may like the smell =\
customer_reviews.author: S. in Sac

customer_reviews.title: FIRST TIME USER
customer_reviews.text: We were using Regenapure DR but are having trouble getting it. I was impressed by Biotin Thickening Shampoo. It is a US product with great ingredients. The smell is pleasant and useable for my husband and me.
customer_reviews.author: Dicat

customer_reviews.title: Significantly reduces hair shedding
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this product twice since buying it. The thing I immediately noticed was that it dramatically reduced the amount of hair that I would shed. Prior to using this product I would shed about 7-10 hairs after running my fingers through a section of hair. Now I lose 0-1. The product smells really good, so good my 6 year old daughter wants to use it. And it makes your hair really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva

customer_reviews.title: Week 1 and off to a great start
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do I write reviews on miracle products but this one seems, so far after one week, to be amazing. Like the way it lathers and first impression is it really helps reduce shedding. Scent is nice and not overpowering, as well.
customer_reviews.author: F1 Racer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective. Smells good, and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I fully finished product to review it. That way it is proper. The product really helped with my dry brittle hair. It helped strengthen it. The product didn’t have a bad sense like other products I have tried . It lasted me quite a while. If use the proper amount, the bottle can last a long time. It left my hair soft, and more wavy. I will probably be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Teckman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 😉
customer_reviews.text: Just after 3 washes my hair feels different, softer in the winter and not as staticky. I have long hair blonde and a ton of it. I curl it and put heat on it every day. It’s sysrting to have a bounce to it again. After 3 washes!!! Amazing ! Ive gone through so many shampoos. The reviews were correct on this one and I’m happy to add my own awesome review now. I just purchased this for my friend who has thinning hair. Very pleased !!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay e moon drone

customer_reviews.title: Volume and Thickness
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many biotin shampoos and been disappointed. I found this one and began using it several months ago. I can tell the difference. You do not need a lot of shampoo to get the lather even with long hair. I don't feel like my hair is greasy or "stripped". I leave the shampoo in my hair while I am in the shower and rinse it right before I complete my shower. For some reason I think my hair is more cooperative and styles better when I do this instead of wash and immediate rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo feels wonderfully thick and leathers nicely. It rinses clean. It smells pleasant – subtle and fresh. Best of all, it contains only natural products and no harmful chemicals! I will definitely continue using this one.
customer_reviews.author: ROTEM SALOMON

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!!! Buy you some!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would help restore my awful postpartum hair! I have lost so much hair and what I do have is limp. Let me tell you-after 1 single wash I could tell a huge difference!!!! I have been using it a week and a half and my hair is so full of volume! I will definitely be reordering! I already can see little baby hairs growing in too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I ordered this. Not sure why, but my hair seemed to be falling out in huge amounts every day & it became so thin. The first time I used this i could tell it made my hair fuller. I’ve used it (&the conditioner) a good 4/5 times now & it really has made a difference. My hair looks/feels so much fuller. I also bought the thickening spray & i use that too! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin
